name: GROW Wireless Inc.
description:
We develop success by understanding.  In today’s world, one needs to understand and be skilled in a host of different disciplines to capitalize on an opportunity or eliminate barriers and be successful.  At GROW, we have embraced this philosophy.
Our expertise does not stop at the boundary between business and technology.  We bridge it.  When crafting a solution, we take into account the business requirements for commercial success.  Many times, the best solution is not necessarily the most technically elegant.  Messaging, user experience, budgets and time-to-market are all important.  We work with you.  We design, we build and we will even host and maintain your solution should you wish – we deliver commercially ready end-to-end solutions.  Whatever your need, a message, marketing or e-commerce website, SaaS platform, mobile app or the growth of existing software assets and infrastructure, we make it happen.
